argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_snex | |- { x } e. _V |
| 2 |  | #P_distop | |- ( { x } e. _V -> ~P { x } e. Top ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- ~P { x } e. Top |
| 4 |  | #P_tgtop | |- ( ~P { x } e. Top -> ( topGen ` ~P { x } ) = ~P { x } ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( topGen ` ~P { x } ) = ~P { x } |
| 6 |  | #P_topbas | |- ( ~P { x } e. Top -> ~P { x } e. TopBases ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- ~P { x } e. TopBases |
| 8 |  | #P_snfi | |- { x } e. Fin |
| 9 |  | #P_pwfi | |- ( { x } e. Fin <-> ~P { x } e. Fin ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpbi | |- ~P { x } e. Fin |
| 11 |  | #P_isfinite | |- ( ~P { x } e. Fin <-> ~P { x } ~< _om ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpbi | |- ~P { x } ~< _om |
| 13 |  | #P_sdomdom | |- ( ~P { x } ~< _om -> ~P { x } ~<_ _om ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- ~P { x } ~<_ _om |
| 15 |  | #P_2ndci | |- ( ( ~P { x } e. TopBases /\ ~P { x } ~<_ _om ) -> ( topGen ` ~P { x } ) e. 2ndc ) |
| 16 | 7, 14, 15 | #P_mp2an | |- ( topGen ` ~P { x } ) e. 2ndc |
| 17 | 5, 16 | #P_eqeltrri | |- ~P { x } e. 2ndc |
| 18 |  | #P_2ndc1stc | |- ( ~P { x } e. 2ndc -> ~P { x } e. 1stc ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_ax-mp | |- ~P { x } e. 1stc |
| 20 | 19 | #P_rgenw | |- A. x e. X ~P { x } e. 1stc |
| 21 |  | #P_dislly | |- ( X e. V -> ( ~P X e. Locally 1stc <-> A. x e. X ~P { x } e. 1stc ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( X e. V -> ~P X e. Locally 1stc ) |
| 23 |  | #P_lly1stc | |- Locally 1stc = 1stc |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_syl6eleq | |- ( X e. V -> ~P X e. 1stc ) |
